title: App is crashing when logging in having pending stickers transaction

labels.name: priority 0: blocker
labels.description: an issues that requires immediate attention and that causes the app to not work at all (e.g a crash)

body:
1. open status and buy some stickers on mainnet with lowest price possible and low gas limit (to have the txn pending )
2. logout when txn is still pending
2. login

As result, the app crashes

```
